TopicTitle: Corruption of Save files and game Crashes (PS5)

Articles.Content:
This game is fun but the crashes & Corruption isn’t. I used to have a save where I got to Eve but when I saved it and got off for the night. The next day it was corrupted and I was unable to restore the file :(. This isn’t the first time this has happened too. Something has to be done about this not just for me but for all console players! It blows my that no one has fixed it and it’s been years.

 

PLEASE FIX THE ENHANCED EDITION DEVS PLEASE :-(
